name: Desiree Evans
about: Whether it be illustration, music or even fashion, todays young artists have moved into a digital realm. A realm of endless possibilities where their creativity can truly flourish.

name: Mack Quinn
about: Powered by the latest Intel and AMD processors, Dell laptops are blank canvas, art class and music studio all rolled into one. A tool to help young artists hone their skills, find new inspirations and create new masterpieces.

name: Hallie Ratliff
about: Today, more than ever, it’s important that a child stays hungry for knowledge and ready to think in new ways. With ExpressCharge™, Dell laptops have what it takes to keep up with the innovators of today as they experiment, learn and create the wonders of tomorrow.

name: Christina Hunter
about: From history and literature to filmmaking and everything in-between, today’s students are interested in a wide variety of things. With an immersive display, Dell laptops enable students to explore their interests, hone their skills and eventually, pursue a passion.

name: Hickman Gilmore
about: For young students today, social media is part and parcel of who they are. It is a readymade platform for their creativity with a world-wide audience to boot. Versatile and portable, with a variety of usage modes, Dell laptops are perfect for content creators who often find inspiration on their daily travels, at home or even at school.

name: Leonor Little
about: First, consider if you want a laptop that runs Windows, Mac OS, or Chrome OS. I’m like, okay, well pro with a message, and an airdrop will be best. name: Delaney Sims
about: From thin and light rows to workstations to gaming laptops, Chromebooks run on Google’s cloud-based Chrome OS. These are popular with students as they are usually much cheaper, and they act more as a terminal for accessing apps in the cloud, like Google Docs Dropbox and despite what you read in the comments.
